p: Bacterial endophytic isolates were screened for phosphate solubilization by the procedure of Jasim et al. [ 78] using Pikovskaya medium (glucose, 10.0 g L −1; Ca 3 (PO 4) 2, 5.0 g L −1; (NH 4) 2So 4, 0.5 g L −1; NaCl, 0.2 g L −1; MgSO 4·7H 2O, 0.1 g L −1; KCl, 0.2 g L −1; FeSO 4·7H 2O, 0.002 g L −1; yeast extract, 0.5 g L −1; MnSO 4, 0.002 g L −1; agar, 20 g L −1) and bromophenol blue as an indicator. After 3 days of incubation at 35 °C, strains that induced a clear zone around the colonies were considered as positive.
